decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the condition, as noted above, is fully discharged.

The applicant is advised that deliveries to the site should avoid school arrival and pick up times due to existing congestion in the area. Deliveries should also (where possible) avoid waiting on the highway.

As the proposed development is within flood zones 2 and 3 or on a site of more than 1ha, you are required to complete a Flood Risk form before the application can be assessed.  For further information and guidance on any aspects of undertaking a Flood Risk Assessment please contact the Environment Agency by visiting their website at http://planningguidance.communities.gov.uk/blog/guidance/flood-risk-and-coastal-change/site-specific-flood-risk-assessment-checklist/
